anchorOrigin.type: { horizontal: left| right, vertical: bottom| top }

badgeContent.description: The content rendered within the badge.
badgeContent.description_zh: 锁屏提醒中呈现的内容。

children.description: The badge will be added relative to this node.
children.description_zh: 锁屏提醒将相对于此节点添加。

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.See CSS classes API below for more details.
classes.description_zh: 覆盖或扩展应用于组件的样式。有关详细信息，请参阅下面的 CSS 类 API。

color.description: The color of the component. It supports both default and custom theme colors, which can be added as shown in the palette customization guide.
color.description_zh: 组件的颜色。它支持默认和自定义主题颜色，可以按照调色板自定义指南中所示进行添加。
color.type: default| primary| secondary| error| info| success| warning| string

component.description: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
component.description_zh: 用于根节点的组件。使用 HTML 元素或组件的字符串。

components.description: The components used for each slot inside.This prop is an alias for the slots prop. It's recommended to use the slots prop instead.
components.description_zh: 内部每个插槽使用的组件。此道具是插槽道具的别名。建议改用插槽道具。

componentsProps.description: The extra props for the slot components. You can override the existing props or add new ones.This prop is an alias for the slotProps prop. It's recommended to use the slotProps prop instead, as componentsProps will be deprecated in the future.
componentsProps.description_zh: 插槽组件的额外道具。您可以覆盖现有道具或添加新道具。此 prop 是 slotProps props 的别名。建议改用 slotProps prop，因为 componentsProps 将来会被弃用。
componentsProps.type: { badge?: func| object, root?: func| object }

invisible.description: If true, the badge is invisible.
invisible.description_zh: 如果为 true，则锁屏提醒不可见。

overlap.description: Wrapped shape the badge should overlap.
overlap.description_zh: 徽章的包装形状应重叠。

showZero.description: Controls whether the badge is hidden when badgeContent is zero.
showZero.description_zh: 控制当 badgeContent 为零时是否隐藏锁屏提醒。

slotProps.description: The props used for each slot inside the Badge.
slotProps.description_zh: 徽章内每个插槽使用的道具。
slotProps.type: { badge?: func| object, root?: func| object }

slots.description: The components used for each slot inside the Badge. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
slots.description_zh: 徽章内每个插槽使用的组件。使用 HTML 元素或组件的字符串。

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.See the `sx` page for more details.
sx.description_zh: 允许定义系统覆盖以及其他 CSS 样式的系统属性。有关更多详细信息，请参阅“sx”页面。
